nodes.text: Tychin was an individual who was a subscriber to, and commenter on, Cynabar's Droid Datalog. On the entry for the Hound-W2 SPD, Tychin wondered if it was possible to use the fact that the droid had to communicate via scomp link to generate a false positive. By reprogramming the translation, the droid would report an intruder as normal, but the resulting communication would instead give an all-clear signal. Tychin believed that if successful, it would allow individuals to get away with less than legal activities.
